        public VertexShape(GameWorld parent,
                   float[] vertices)
        Create a new VertexShape, a shape that is defined by vertices.
        Parameters:
        parent - The parent of the shape
        vertices - an array of 2D vertices in the format: [x1, y2, x2, y2, ... xn, yn] for n vertices.
